import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useLanguage } from '../contexts/LanguageContext'; function Mentors() { const { t } = useLanguage(); const [activeCategory, setActiveCategory] = useState('all'); const mentors = [ { id: 1, name: 'Aakash Verma', role: 'Software Engineer', company: 'Google', image: 'üßë‚Äçüíª', expertise: ['DSA', 'System Design', 'Interview Prep'], availability: 'Every Saturday', category: 'tech', rating: 4.9, sessions: 150, experience: '5 years' }, { id: 2, name: 'Riya Patel', role: 'Product Manager', company: 'Microsoft', image: 'üë©‚Äçüíº', expertise: ['Product Design', 'Agile', 'Roadmaps'], availability: 'Weekend Slots', category: 'career', rating: 4.8, sessions: 120, experience: '6 years' }, { id: 3, name: 'Sneha Roy', role: 'AI Research Intern', company: 'NVIDIA', image: 'üë©‚Äçüíª', expertise: ['ML', 'Deep Learning', 'AI Ethics'], availability: 'Flexible', category: 'data', rating: 4.9, sessions: 80, experience: '3 years' } ]; const categories = [ { id: 'all', label: t('mentors.allMentors'), icon: 'üåü' }, { id: 'tech', label: t('mentors.techDevelopment'), icon: 'üåê' }, { id: 'data', label: t('mentors.dataScience'), icon: 'üßÆ' }, { id: 'career', label: t('mentors.careerSkills'), icon: 'üíº' } ]; const filteredMentors = activeCategory === 'all' ? mentors : mentors.filter(mentor => mentor.category === activeCategory); return (
{/* Header */}

{t('mentors.title')}

{t('mentors.subtitle')}

{/* Category Filters */}
{categories.map((category) => ( ))}
{/* Stats */}
{filteredMentors.length}
{t('mentors.available')}
{filteredMentors.reduce((sum, mentor) => sum + mentor.sessions, 0)}
{t('mentors.totalSessions')}
{/* Mentors Grid */}
{filteredMentors.map((mentor) => (
{mentor.image}

{mentor.name}

{mentor.role} at {mentor.company}

‚≠ê {mentor.rating}

üîπ {t('mentors.expertise')}:

{mentor.expertise.map((skill, index) => ( {skill} ))}
üîπ {t('mentors.availability')}: {mentor.availability}
üìä {t('mentors.sessions')}: {mentor.sessions} {t('mentors.completed')}
üíº {t('mentors.experience')}: {mentor.experience}
))}
); } export default Mentors;
